scripts.server: npm run client:build && docker-compose up -d mongo redis && node ./server/index.js
scripts.docker:build: docker build --rm -t ignitial/dlake . && docker tag ignitial/dlake registry.gitlab.com/ignitial/dlake:${npm_package_version} && docker tag ignitial/dlake ignitial/dlake:${npm_package_version}
scripts.docker:publish:private: npm run docker:build && docker push registry.gitlab.com/ignitial/dlake && docker push registry.gitlab.com/ignitial/dlake:${npm_package_version}
scripts.docker:publish:public: npm run docker:build && docker push ignitial/dlake && docker push ignitial/dlake:${npm_package_version}
scripts.docker:publish:minikube: docker save ignitial/dlake:${npm_package_version} | (eval $(minikube docker-env) && docker load)
